attributes.action: Ban homework that children are expected to do over the weekend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the idea of a weekend is a break its grossly unfair that children should have to spend it doing homework. The aim of this petition is to put in safe guards for children against school work taking over their free weekend time.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
